about_the_game:
Tank Force: A New Era Of Tank Battles

Welcome to the Tank Force, where every tank carries on its armored shoulders the story of endless PvP battles and tank wars. This free game invites you to an exciting online adventure where you will become the hero of your own military epic.



react and win

Tank Force is not just a shooter, it is a world where every tankman can test his strategic and tactical skills. Take part in an arms race, choose your perfect tank from a variety of military equipment and show your skills in dynamic PvP battles. The fighting here is not just a battle, but a real war for territory and resources.

difference of techniques and strategies

In Tank Force you will find a huge arsenal of modern tanks and artillery, which allows each tankman to find his own unique weapons and tactics. From light and maneuverable vehicles to powerful heavy tanks, everyone will find equipment to their liking. Your guns and artillery can change the outcome of any battle, and the right strategy and coordination with allies will lead to victory.



Online multiplayer and cross-platform

Play with or against your friends regardless of the platform! Thanks to its cross-platform nature, Tank Force unites players from all over the world, making each battle unique. Join online battles, form combat alliances and demonstrate your skills on the international stage.

the colorful world and attention to detail

The graphics of the Tank Force game amaze with its realism and detail. Every tank, every landscape and every explosion are executed with impeccable precision, which allows you to immerse yourself deeper into the atmosphere of battles. The soundtrack and special effects only enhance the feeling of being on the battlefield.



Develop and reach new heights

In Tank Force, every tankman has the opportunity to develop their skills and improve their tanks. With each battle, your experience grows, opening access to new, more powerful and advanced machines and technologies. Your path will be difficult, but each victory brings you closer to the title of a legend of tank battles.

Join the Tank Force community

Tank Force is not only about battles and wars, it's about millions of players around the world who share your passion for tank battles. Join the community, participate in tournaments, share experiences and become a part of global history.

Let every battle in Tank Force be not only a test for you, but also a chance to show your uniqueness and strategic talent. Start your journey into the tanks today and become a true hero of the great tank war!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Tank Force: Online Shooter Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tank Force - the coolest free online tank shooter! This is a new word in online tank battles, which combines the best qualities of a tank simulator and thrilling arcade battles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian*, Japanese, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Danish
*languages with full audio support
